html:
** Shares of e-commerce giant AMZN.O down 3.4% at $2,908.31 premarket amid a sell-off in other big tech stocks following downbeat forecast from Meta Platforms Inc FB.O

** Electronics retailer Best Buy Co Inc BBY.N signs deal to use AMZN's Amazon Web Services to support its cloud infrastructure (Full Story)

** AWS, a prominent cloud computing service in the market, boasts a roster of big-name clients, including trading app Robinhood HOOD.N, Walt Disney Co DIS.N and Netflix NFLX.O

** BBY shares are flat before the bell

** In 2021, BBY and AMZN rose ~2% each


(Reporting by Eva Mathews in Bengaluru)

(( eva.mathews@thomsonreuters.com ))
